description: Zombi event streaming system monitoring dashboard. Displays application metrics from /metrics endpoint.

panels.description: Current ingestion throughput in MB/s from write operations.
panels.title: Ingestion MB/s

panels.description: Estimated hourly cost: EC2 ($instance_cost_hr) + S3 PUT ($0.005/1K) + S3 storage ($0.023/GB/mo).
panels.title: Est. Cost ($/hr)

panels.description: Estimated daily cost extrapolated from current hourly rate.
panels.title: Est. Cost ($/day)

panels.description: Cost per million events ingested. Includes EC2 + S3 PUT + S3 storage costs.
panels.title: Cost per Million Events

panels.description: Cost per GB of data ingested.
panels.title: Cost per GB Ingested

panels.description: Combined view: MB/s throughput and events/s rate.
panels.title: Throughput: MB/s + Events/s

list.description: EC2 instance cost per hour in USD. Default: t3.micro ap-southeast-1.
list.label: Instance Cost ($/hr)
list.name: instance_cost_hr

title: Zombi Event Streaming
